name: RainonTrees
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Trees”
”Alexa ask Rain on Trees to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on trees
des:
Experience the refreshing and rejuvenating sound of rain falling on leafy trees. This skill brings the outdoors in, allowing you to enjoy the natural melody of raindrops tapping on leaves, enhancing relaxation or providing a peaceful backdrop for your activities.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Trees
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
